body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install py-torchvision
==> Error: Multiple providers found for 'blas': ['intel-mkl', 'openblas@0.3.7%gcc@8.3.0+avx2~avx512 cpu_target=auto ~ilp64+pic+shared threads=none ~virtual_machine arch=linux-centos7-skylake']
$ spack install py-torchvision ^openblas
```

Tried also this:
```console
==> Error: Multiple providers found for 'blas': ['intel-mkl', 'openblas@0.3.7%gcc@8.3.0+avx2~avx512 cpu_target=auto ~ilp64+pic+shared threads=none ~virtual_machine arch=linux-centos7-skylake']
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux 0c9821f2e4c1 3.10.0-1062.1.2.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Sep 30 14:19:46 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 

- `packages.yaml` and `compilers.yaml` 
https://gist.github.com/iarspider/7a9a7685e9c93fb214b608bb85bf9f19

### Additional information
title: Installation issue: py-torchvision
